body_html:
I have just managed to compile tensorflow using gcc 6.4.1 with CUDA/CUDnn support (first said it couldn't find CUDnn but kept defaults a second time and then it found it) on Arch.
I guess someone has been fixing things? I'll close for now as the original issue seems to be fixed.

NVIDIA: 387.34-21
CUDA: 9.1.85-1
CUDnn: 7.0.5-2
gcc6: 6.4.1-5

body:
I have just managed to compile tensorflow using gcc 6.4.1 with CUDA/CUDnn support (first said it couldn't find CUDnn but kept defaults a second time and then it found it) on Arch.
I guess someone has been fixing things?  I'll close for now as the original issue seems to be fixed.

NVIDIA: 387.34-21
CUDA: 9.1.85-1
CUDnn: 7.0.5-2
gcc6: 6.4.1-5
